pages.text: The $(major)Speed(0) Gene gives entities the $(minor)Speed effect$(0).$(br2)This Gene can be $(minor)mutated into Speed 2$(0) and $(minor)Speed 4$(0).$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)• Horse$(br)• Ocelot$(br)• Rabbit$(br)• Fox$(br)• Dolphin
